title: Leading primetime TV programming genres viewed in the U.S. 2015
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 48.0 is found at Response Sitcoms or comedy and the minimum is found at Soap operas where Response is 4.0.
The highest Response Sitcoms or comedy has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Soap operas.
min_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Sitcoms or comedy and lowest at Response Soap operas.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 48.0 is found at Response Sitcoms or comedy and the minimum is found at Soap operas where Response is 4.0.
The highest Response Sitcoms or comedy has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Soap operas.
max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 48.0 is found at Response Sitcoms or comedy and the minimum is found at Soap operas where Response is 4.0.
There is a difference of 44.0 between the maximum Response Sitcoms or comedy and minimum Response Soap operas.
Response Sitcoms or comedy is higher than any other Responses with value 48.0, followed by Movies, and Drama. Down to Response Soap operas with the lowest value 4.0.
Response Children's, and Other type not listed have the same Share of respondents.
The average Share of respondents in all 15 Responses is 22.53.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 338.0.
